projects.heading: Grow Game
projects.description: This project taught me the basics of building an interactive web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I learned how to structure a web page, style elements for both desktop and mobile devices, and add interactivity through event listeners and DOM manipulation. Additionally, I gained familiarity with organizing code into functions and managing state to create a simple game-like experience where users can interact with elements on the page to simulate the growth of a plant.

projects.heading: She Invests
projects.description: The Vue.js-based prediction market app, developed with JavaScript, Express, MySQL, bcrypt, hosted on Clever Cloud, with cookie-based user credential management and product cart storage, completed in three weeks, greatly improved my full-stack development, database management, and cloud deployment skills as a beginner.

projects.heading: Calculator
projects.description: Creating a JavaScript calculator emphasized clean code and function usage, improving code organization, reusability, and laying the groundwork for scalable and maintainable projects through modular coding practices.

projects.heading: To-Do List
projects.text: A To-Do List to help you organize your life
projects.description: Building a JavaScript to-do list strengthened my fundamental coding skills, particularly in DOM manipulation for dynamic task management, enhancing my understanding of frontend development, and reinforcing my JavaScript foundation for future coding challenges.

projects.heading: Nexus Gym
projects.text: Node.js Group Project, I handled frontend. Built with Bootstrap and basic HTML, JavaScript, Node, Thunderclient and Render
projects.description: This project taught me how to communicate effectively with my partner and create a website that suited us both.

projects.heading: Keyboard
projects.text: An E-commerce Website created mainly with JavaScript
projects.description: Creating a keyboard using HTML and CSS as a student sharpened my frontend development skills, emphasizing structured and styled elements for visually appealing interfaces, while reinforcing responsive design principles, serving as a foundational experience for advanced web development.

resume.heading: Soft Skills
resume.skill: Problem Solver, Listening & Communication Skills, Updated on Industry Trends, Team Player and Analytical Skills

resume.heading: Technical Skills
resume.skill: HTML-5, Javascript & CSS, Digital Marketing, UI/UX, Github & Git, Figma, Bootstrap Framework, Vue.js Framework and Web Design

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Matthew Brown - Lecturer
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha is a hardworking and dedicated individual. Her attitude shows through her dedication and creativity. She is an amazing team player and always shows consistency in all she does and strives to always improve in the face of adversity.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Candice Amon - Manager
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson consistently arrives early, works diligently, and maintains a respectful demeanor. She demonstrates composure and kindness, readily offering assistance to fellow students struggling with class topics.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Natasha George - Manager
testimonial.message: Ty consistently delivers outstanding results with detailed, refined, and high-quality work that exceeds expectations. We highly recommend working with Ty and look forward to future collaborations.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Seth Tobias - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson's genuine personality creates an inviting atmosphere, fostering open communication. Her commitment to improvement reflects high standards and unwavering determination, showcasing excellence in all she does.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Zubaidah Isaacs - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha Johnson has good leadership skills. She is dedicated and committed to her work. Being acquainted with her made me realize that hard work always pays off and what you put in is what you get out.

testimonial.heading: Testimonials
testimonial.name: Shaheem Salie - Colleague
testimonial.message: Tyhiesha is an exceptionally determined and hardworking individual. Her unwavering commitment to tasks and her impressive ability to overcome challenges is truly remarkable.
